sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to our service. By using our service, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.

sections.heading: Use of Service
sections.content: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms and conditions.

sections.heading: Privacy Policy
sections.content: Our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information, is incorporated by reference into these terms.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on this page.
